name: Candy Run (Liioni)
description:
A game made for the 48 hour Spooky 2D Jam '21.

You play as a person trying to get to a pumpkin full of candy before scary monsters that hunt behind. If the monsters reach you they will do a trick or treat. If you got no treats to give... Well, nothing else but trick is left!

Move the character with A and D, or Arrow Keys. Jump with space. 

Traps will kill you instantly. 

Right now there's two similar levels that spawn on random, which makes it sort of endless. I'm hoping to add more levels later on.

Art, Design and Programming made by me (Liioni) during the jam time.

SFX made with https://sfxr.me/

Music by TeknoAXE

http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1758&genre=Techno
